description: GD serial bus reshesh rate. 0:fsw*2, 1:fsw*(2/3), 2:fsw/?, 3: fsw/?

name: pm_cfg.0.modType
description: PWM BTL modulation type; 0 => 2-level (AD), 1 => 3-level (BD), 2 => 3-level (FC no-CM), 3 => 5-level

name: pm_cfg.0.lf_bw_scale
description: Loop filter freq. resp. mode; 0 => low-bw, 1=> mid-bw; 2,3=> high-bw

name: pm_cfg.0.pbtl_half
description: High to use only a single channel for PBTL operation (power saving feature), low for std. PBTL.

name: pm_cfg.0.gd_hvpu_low
description: High to use reduced-pullup (x1/4) in gate driver for gate charge power saving.

name: pm_cfg.0.dtsteps_nom
description: Nominal number of dead time steps (5-ish ns per step.)

name: pm_cfg.0.bal_bw
description: Vcfly balancing HW loop gain/bandwidth. "00" => lowest. "11" => highest.
